languages.text: "После смерти души {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g} перемещаются в камни, а те в свою очередь становятся частью Контура бесконечности на {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мире-корабле{/g}, продолжая служить своему народу и после телесной жизни. И нет преступления страшнее, чем навредить путеводному камню и обречь бессмертную душу Дитя Азуриана на вечные муки в чреве Той, Что Жаждет".

traits.locale_text: "После смерти души {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g} перемещаются в камни, а те в свою очередь становятся частью Контура бесконечности на {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мире-корабле{/g}, продолжая служить своему народу и после телесной жизни. И нет преступления страшнее, чем навредить путеводному камню и обречь бессмертную душу Дитя Азуриана на вечные муки в чреве Той, Что Жаждет".

languages.text: "The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, and then they become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."
languages.original_text: "После смерти души {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g} перемещаются в камни, а те в свою очередь становятся частью Контура бесконечности на {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мире-корабле{/g}, продолжая служить своему народу и после телесной жизни. И нет преступления страшнее, чем навредить путеводному камню и обречь бессмертную душу Дитя Азуриана на вечные муки в чреве Той, Что Жаждет".

traits.locale_text: "The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, which then become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a Waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

"The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, which then become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a Waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

"The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, and then they become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

languages.text: “当{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}死后，他们的灵魂会进入引路石，之后成为{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}中永恒回路的一部分。这样一来，即便肉体消失，他们也可以继续为族人服务。若是引路石遭到蓄意破坏，阿苏焉子嗣不朽的灵魂就会在饥渴女士的巨口中遭到永恒的折磨，没有比这更加卑鄙的罪行了。”
languages.original_text: "The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, and then they become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

traits.locale_text: “当{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}死后，他们的灵魂会进入引路石，之后成为{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}中永恒回路的一部分。这样一来，即便肉体消失，他们也可以继续为族人服务。若是引路石遭到蓄意破坏，阿苏焉子嗣不朽的灵魂就会在饥渴女士的巨口中遭到永恒的折磨，没有比这更加卑鄙的罪行了。”

languages.original_text: "The souls of the Children of Asuryan move into the stones after death, and then they become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a craftworld so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

languages.text: «Las almas de los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} se trasladan a las joyas al morir, y después pasan a formar parte del Circuito Infinito de un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g} para que puedan seguir sirviendo a su gente aun después de haber perdido su cuerpo. No existe un crimen más deleznable que dañar una piedra del alma y condenar al alma inmortal de un hijo de Asuryan a una eternidad de tormento en las fauces de la Sedienta».
languages.original_text: "The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, and then they become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

traits.locale_text: «Las almas de los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} se trasladan a las joyas al morir, y después pasan a formar parte del Circuito Infinito de un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g} para que puedan seguir sirviendo a su gente aun después de haber perdido su cuerpo. No existe un crimen más deleznable que dañar una piedra del alma y condenar al alma inmortal de un hijo de Asuryan a una eternidad de tormento en las fauces de la Sedienta».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}の魂は死後、石に宿り、{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}の無限回路の一部となるのだ。こうして、肉体を失おうとも同族に奉仕することができる。ゆえにこそ、方位石を害し、アシュリアンの御子らの不滅の魂を〈かの渇きたる女〉の口の中で永遠の苦悩に陥れることほど卑劣な罪はない」
languages.original_text: "The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, and then they become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}の魂は死後、石に宿り、{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}の無限回路の一部となるのだ。こうして、肉体を失おうとも同族に奉仕することができる。ゆえにこそ、方位石を害し、アシュリアンの御子らの不滅の魂を〈かの渇きたる女〉の口の中で永遠の苦悩に陥れることほど卑劣な罪はない」

languages.text: "Die Seelen der {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} ziehen nach dem Tod in die Steine ein und werden dann Teil der Unendlichkeitsmatrix auf einem {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g}, damit sie ihrem Volk auch dann noch dienen können, wenn der Körper vergangen ist. Es gibt kein schändlicheres Verbrechen, als einem Wegstein zu schaden und die unsterbliche Seele eines Kinds von Asuryan zu ewigen Qualen im Schlund von Ihr, die dürstet, zu verdammen."
languages.original_text: "The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, and then they become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

traits.locale_text: "Die Seelen der {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} ziehen nach dem Tod in die Steine ein und werden dann Teil der Unendlichkeitsmatrix auf einem {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g}, damit sie ihrem Volk auch dann noch dienen können, wenn der Körper vergangen ist. Es gibt kein schändlicheres Verbrechen, als einem Wegstein zu schaden und die unsterbliche Seele eines Kinds von Asuryan zu ewigen Qualen im Schlund von Ihr, die dürstet, zu verdammen."

languages.text: « Les âmes des {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} sont transférées aux pierres après la mort, puis elles rejoignent le Circuit d'Infinité d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g} afin de continuer à servir leur peuple même après la perte de leur enveloppe corporelle. Il n'existe pas de crime plus ignoble que détruire une pierre gardienne et ainsi condamner l'âme immortelle d'un Asuryani à une éternité de tourment dans les mâchoires de l'Assoiffée. »
languages.original_text: "The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, and then they become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

traits.locale_text: « Les âmes des {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} sont transférées aux pierres après la mort, puis elles rejoignent le Circuit d'Infinité d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g} afin de continuer à servir leur peuple même après la perte de leur enveloppe corporelle. Il n'existe pas de crime plus ignoble que détruire une pierre gardienne et ainsi condamner l'âme immortelle d'un Asuryani à une éternité de tourment dans les mâchoires de l'Assoiffée. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın{/g} ruhları, ölümün ardından taşlara yerleşerek bir {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünyada{/g} bulunan Ebedî Devre'nin bir parçası hâline gelir. Bu sayede bedenlerinden yoksun olsalar dahi halklarına hizmet edebilirler. Yol taşına zarar vererek bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'nun ölümsüz ruhunu Susayan'ın kursağında ebedî ızdıraba mahkûm etmekten daha aşağılık bir suç yoktur."
languages.original_text: "The souls of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} move into the stones after death, and then they become a part of the Infinity Circuit on a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} so they can serve their people even when the body is gone. There is no crime more despicable than harming a waystone and dooming the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan to an eternity of torment in the maw of She Who Thirsts."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g}'nın ruhları, ölümün ardından taşlara yerleşerek bir {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünya{/g}da bulunan Ebedî Devre'nin bir parçası hâline gelir. Bu sayede bedenlerinden yoksun olsalar dahi halklarına hizmet edebilirler. Yol taşına zarar vererek bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğunun ölümsüz ruhunu Susayan'ın kursağında ebedî ızdıraba mahkûm etmekten daha aşağılık bir suç yoktur."
